name: LSD: Revamped
summary: LSD: Revamped is a fan-made remake of the cult-classic PS1 game LSD: Dream Emulator.

name: Ls
summary: ls is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame madeby an unknown creator. The game stars lca (with a lowercase L).

name: LSD Battlefield Simulator
summary: Experience the most surreal shooter ever made. LSD Battlefield Simulator, the mythical 12th installment in the #1 best-selling FPS franchise Tour of Honor, is finally hereâ€”remastered and unleashed after 25 years in the vault.

name: LSD: Dream Emulator Retro
summary: Immerse yourself in a dreamy and psychedelic world through low poly enviroments and liminal spaces. A Retro game influenced by the original LSD: Dream Emulator from PSX.

name: LSD: Dream Emulator
summary:
In LSD the player navigates through a psychedelic dream world. The idea is simply to walk around and explore things in a dream environment. There are many strange environments in this world, and one way to travel through them is by foot. However, if the player bumps into walls or other objects in the game, they will be transported to another environment instantaneously through a system called "linking". Bumping into people, animals, or special objects usually results in a stranger dream.

Each dream can last up to 10 minutes, after which the player will 'wake up', when the screen fades away and the player is sent back to the game's initial menu. However, if the player falls off a cliff or into a hole in the dream, then the player will wake up immediately. There is a graph that appears at the end of each dream that keeps track of the player's state of mind; the states are Upper, Downer, Static and Dynamic, as referring to the environments and the general feel of the dream the player just went through. Past states may have effects on later dreams.

name: L.S.S
summary:
You are sent in on top secret missions across the world to erase any existence of the governments tests.
BUT things don't seem to go to plan as you are forced to fight for your life in a hope you will make it out alive!

name: LSI Table Stadium Baseball
summary: LSI Table Stadium Baseball is a LCD interpretation of baseball.

name: L.S.S II
summary: L.S.S the fast paced wave shooter returns with all new game mechanics and enemy types to make the game even faster!

name: LSD
summary:
LSD is the new match 3 game with beautiful juicy anime graphics! Classic light casual gameplay in the best traditions of the genre. Explore casual match3 in company with naked anime girls
It's easy to learn. Line up and win!

name: LSD: The Game
summary: An official game by LSD. A fast-paced, three-stage game where you play as famous singer-songwiter Sia, Labrinth or Diplo through 9 levels and 3 boss levels! After the bosses you get access to the snippets of the songs from the upcoming album "Labrinth, Sia & Diplo Present... LSD"

name: LSD
summary:
You are sent in on top secret missions across the world to erase any existence of the governments tests.
But things don't seem to go to plan as you are forced to fight for your life in a hope that you will make it out alive!
Use weapons, traps and throwable's to defeat the infected or use the skills menu to make the ultimate solider.
Enemies range from walking/running to explosive, ranged and even invisible.

name: LSDriver 1+2: Remastered Collection
summary: LSDriver 1 + 2 is a compilation of 2 racing games with real physics and ragdoll style characters that lose parts of their bodies, have fun trying to complete very crazy tracks.

name: L.S.D.: Lasting Spiritual Derangement
summary: L.S.D. is a first person shooter set during a hallucinogen trip.In this dream-like, surreal experience, you will explore large, mysterious open worlds, find weapons and fight against dangerous enemies.Will you be able to break the loop and get back to reality?
